values: To deform something means to change it from its correct or original shape.
The computer program deformed the building’s picture into an unreal sight.

- vt. 使成畸形；使变形
- vi. 变形；变畸形
- adj. 畸形的；丑陋的


时 态:  
deformed, deforming, deforms 

名 词:  
deformability

形容词:  
deformable

- vt. 使成畸形；使变形
- vi. 变形；变畸形
- adj. 畸形的；丑陋的


时 态:  
deformed, deforming, deforms 

名 词:  
deformability

形容词:  
deformable
v. 改变……的外形，损毁……的形状
